item.title: Emails being unintentionally resent by Outlook
item.description: IssuesLately, I developed a Python tool that automates sending emails through the Outlook client. After a while, I noticed that sometimes the same email is sent twice. I went through my code thoroughly but couldn’t identify any factors that could be causing this issue.
